category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: DesignContextPreciseRevRule.Alpha Best_App.PRECISE
preference.preference_description: Allows the search of Product Structure based on certain revision rules which have the special clauses for which there are no Appearance Sets available, whereas Appearance Sets are available for a revision rule which have all the clauses leaving the Special Clause e.g. "Precise" Clause. Please make sure that a stripped down version of Revision Rule exists and is used for creating an Appearance Set. Here in this example "Alpha Best_App" is a stripped down version of revision Rule "Alpha Best", which has all clauses of "Alpha Best" other than the "Precise" clause. Syntax: DesignContextPreciseRevRule.<RuleName>.Suffix. Supported suffix constants are: ".PRECISE"
